thread.section_title: The Trafalgar Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Not a Hilton standard hotel
thread.title_full: Not a Hilton standard hotel - Review of The Trafalgar Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Amie N
title: Not a Hilton standard hotel
text: Disappointing breakfast, dated decor and furniture in the bedroom and bathroom and poor communication about the use of the rooftop bar. Not what we expect from a Hilton. Even though the roof top bar and view are listed as a feature of the hotel this was shut and we weren't made aware until we arrived. Overall disappointing stay and service.
